session_id.description: Unique identifier for the user session.

task_id.description: Identifier for the specific task being performed.

window_idx.description: The sequential index of the time window within the task.

mouse_features.description: Mouse-derived features for the current window.

keystroke_features.description: Keystroke-derived features for the current window.

scroll_features.description: Scroll-derived features for the current window.

feature_vector.description: Combined features (merged set) used as model input. Strict order is defined when feature set is finalized.

meta.description: Metadata used for version control and reproducibility.
